ctu_text: 200"}]}, {"type": "table", "children": [{"type": "table_row", "children": [{"type": "table_cell", "children": [{"text": "100% assistance to government agencies and 50% back ended credit-linked assistance for private partners "}]}]}]}]}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Any other provisions shall be as per RKVY Guidelines. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The key objectives of the scheme are as follows:"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "\u2022\tTo encourage and expand tree plantation in complementary and integrated manner with crops and livestock, to improve productivity, employment opportunities, income generation and livelihoods of rural households, especially the small farmers. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "\u2022\tTo ensure availability of quality planting material like seeds, seedlings, clones, hybrids, improved varieties, etc. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "\u2022\tTo popularise various Agroforestry practices/models suitable to different agro ecological regions and land use conditions.
caption: Poster 1/5 – Target_Pop (numbers verified)

ctu_text: "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "\u2022\tTo create database, information and knowledge support in the area of agroforestry. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "\u2022\tTo provide Research & Development (R&D), extension and capacity building support to agroforestry sector. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "\u2022\tTo identify and catalyze linkages with traditional and emerging markets for the timber and non-timber products generated from agroforestry plantation on farmland including Bio-fuels, matchwood, plywood, silk, fiber, lac, beauty and wellness sector, handicrafts, construction, etc. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "\u2022\tTo promote value addition and processing of agroforestry produce by creating collection and post-harvest facilities for additional income generation by farmers.
image_prompt: Flat-icon infographic, pastel palette – "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "\u2022\tTo create database, information and knowledge support in the
caption: Poster 2/5 – Benefits (numbers verified)

ctu_text: "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "4)\tSustainable availability of Quality Planting Material for agroforestry"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "5)\tPromote the setting up of new small, medium and hi-tech nurseries for producing Quality Planting Materials (QPM) like seeds, seedlings, clones, and improved varieties to meet the requirement of farmers. "}]}]}, "applicationProcess": [{"mode": "Offline", "process": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "As per RKVY guidelines", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"bold": true, "text": ""}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Step 01: Proposals can be submitted to States. The State Government will examine the project proposal from the viewpoint of suitability to the priorities and objectives of the State and the general framework of RKVY. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Step 02: If found suitable, the proposal will be forwarded to the State Level Sanctioning Committee (SLSC) chaired by Chief Secretary for consideration.

Step 01: Proposals can be submitted to States. The State Government will examine the project proposal from the viewpoint of suitability to the priorities and objectives of the State and the general framework of RKVY.
Step 02: If found suitable, the proposal will be forwarded to the State Level Sanctioning Committee (SLSC) chaired by Chief Secretary for consideration.
